headline: MCK Q1 Earnings Call: Product Mix Shifts, Portfolio Moves, and Strategic Acquisitions Highlight Quarter
summary: Healthcare distributor and services company McKesson (NYSE:MCK) missed Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, but sales rose 18.9% year on year to $90.82 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $10.12 per share was 3% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
